org.openjena.atlas.io
Class PeekReader

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Reader
      org.openjena.atlas.io.PeekReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Readable
public final class PeekReader
extends Reader

Parsing-centric reader. This class is not thread safe.

See Also:
BufferingWriter, PeekInputStream
